meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sibilant.
meanings.sent1: The sibilancies of the snake's hiss made me shiver.
meanings.sent2: The sibilancies of the wind through the trees created a soothing sound.
meanings.sent3: The sibilancies of the leaky faucet kept me up all night.
meanings.sent4: The sibilancies of the audience's whispers filled the theater.
meanings.sent5: The sibilancies of the steam escaping from the kettle were like a gentle song.

meanings.sent1: The cat made sibilancies as it prepared to pounce.
meanings.sent2: The sibilancies of the boiling water warned of its heat.
meanings.sent3: The sibilancies of the deflating balloon startled the children.
meanings.sent4: The sibilancies of the tires on the wet road sounded like a snake slithering.
meanings.sent5: The sibilancies of the radio static filled the room with an eerie noise.
